review: works better then any thing else i've tried.
author: James Hegenauer

review: really love this service. I am dumping my cable service and saving about $600 a year. All you need is this and a HDantenna for local stations.
author: Neill

review: I love this product. It makes streaming movies from Amazon prime and Netflix so very easy.
author: nollie

review: While I genraly like the fire stick, I just don't care for the menu. I would prefer more of a GUI interface. It is a bit more intuitive. Over all not a bad product.
author: Relishh

review: This Fire TV Stick works great! So easy to set up and get activated...enjoying a free 30-day trial to Amazon Prime and looking forward to watching some good movies and shows this summer!
author: Margaret R. Baeza

review: I guess if you live in the USA, this device might work well for you. I live in the Caribbean and I get virtually nothing new from it. I signed on to Netflix, so I get their movies. I signed on to Prime, but cannot view videos or download music (Amazon did warn about contents not being available outside the USA). So having bought and installed Fire Stick, I cannot get YouTube or History or any of the prime TV channels or other entertainment services. I know friends here who have other similar devices and enjoy full entertainment. Amazon really disappointed me with both Prime and Fire Stick. They should simply warn their customers who live outside the USA not to purchase these devices/services!
author: Raffique Shah

review: Good piece of machinery. Puts all of your apps in one place, very convenient!
author: Lori Stephenson

review: Love the ease of using this
author: Gail Green
